toastTitle.refresh: Great! The page has been refreshed successfully!
toastTitle.memoEdited: Your memo has been updated successfully!
toastTitle.categoryEdited: The category has been changed successfully!
toastTitle.memoWishListDeleted: The memo has been removed from your wish list.
toastTitle.memoWishListAdded: The memo has been added to your wish list!

login.welcomeDescription: Let's make memo-taking easier and more convenient together!
login.askGoInstallExtension: Looks like you haven't installed our extension yet. You'll need it to use all the great memo features. Would you like to install it now?
login.personalInformationInfo: Don't worry! Your personal information is strictly protected and will never be used for marketing purposes.

dialogInstall.title: Extension Not Installed
dialogInstall.description: To use all the wonderful memo features, you'll need to install our extension. Would you like to install it now?

dialogVersion.title: Exciting News! New Version Available!
dialogVersion.description: We've made some improvements! You can update from version {{currentVersion}} to {{lastVersion}}.
dialogVersion.itIsLastVersion: You're all set! You're using the latest version.

welcome.title: Welcome to Web Memo! üéâ
welcome.description: Let's create a memo! Press {{isMac ? 'Option + S' : 'Alt + S'}} to open the side panel!

save.title: Save Your Memos
save.description:
Great job!
Now you can write memos in this side panel.
Enter your memo and press {{isMac ? 'Command + S' : 'Ctrl + S'}} to save it.
When the memo border changes from blue to default, it means your save was successful!
Don't worry, it also auto-saves every 3 seconds ‚ò∫Ô∏è

check.title: Check Your Memos
check.description: Finally, click the refresh button to see your latest memos!

emptyState.message: You don't have any saved memos yet. Open the side panel to create your first memo!
